About Dezmond Rosier

Dezmond Rosier is the right candidate for this moment in Charles County. He is running for County Commissioner in District 1, which includes Bel Alton, Port Tobacco, Welcome, Dentsville, and the southern Route 301 corridor just outside the county seat of La Plata.

While District 1 has become increasingly competitive in recent election cycles, it has continued to support Democratic candidates at the top of the ticket—creating a clear opportunity for bold, people centered leadership rooted in local values.

Learn More

Our Priorities

While others are focused on the politics of the past, Dezmond is focused on the possibilities of our future.

Community First

District 1 Protection Plan

Safeguarding what makes our community strong by strengthening the Rural Legacy Program, expanding agricultural easements, and ensuring taxpayer dollars stay in the community.

The Next Generation Guarantee

Securing the future of our students through a true partnership between the Board of Commissioners and Board of Education, with teacher incentives and workforce-linked schools.

Honoring the Frontline

Making Charles County a destination for dedicated public safety professionals who are supported, retained, and valued in our community.

Preserving Our Rural Character

Protecting our community from unchecked data center development with strong Community Benefit Agreements and infrastructure-first mandates.

Honest Planning & Healthy Communities

Addressing traffic congestion, food deserts, and bringing high-quality jobs to Charles County so our young people can build their futures at home.

View All Priorities
